ComicInfo.Summary: With criminals and corrupt politicians in power, the masked vigilantes are on the run. The Spider ventures to Albany to investigate the newly elected governor who has signed all of the unjust measures into law, while Green Hornet seeks to find the secret masters of the Justice Party. The Shadow encounters other heroes who have run afoul of the Black Legions, and still more individuals are inspired to don masks and take to the streets in the name of justice.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 17:50:08. [CVDB381443]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alex Ross, Ardian Syaf, Chris Eliopoulos
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Bat, Black Terror, Green Lama, Kato, Margo Lane, Miss Fury (Drake), Ram Singh, The Clock, The Green Hornet, The Shadow, The Spider, Zorro
ComicInfo.Teams: Justice Party, Masks, The Black Legions, The Green Hornet and Kato
ComicInfo.Locations: New York City, New York State
